summary: Project involves a payment/wallet app with deposit functionality, UPI payment integration, and admin panel features.
architectural_notes: UPI intent link integration for payments with fallback 'Copy UPI ID' button
Wallet balance system with admin-controlled updates via payment screenshot approval

existing_features.title: Update the minimum deposit amount displayed and enforced in the ManualDepositModal frontend component to ₹10. The input field should show a minimum value of 10, and client-side validation should prevent submission of amounts below ₹10 with an error message stating the minimum is ₹10.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change minimum deposit amount to 10 rupees
Update the minimum deposit amount validation in the backend from its current value to 10 rupees (₹10). Reject any deposit requests below this threshold with an appropriate error message.

projectName: Change minimum deposit amount to 10 rupees
